content:
Hello!

I'm looking to get started doing projects in Lean and would like to have other people to work with. Are there any group projects suitable for beginners going on that are looking for more people? I am most knowledgeable in algebra, geometry, topology, and math education, but I'm happy to work in other areas as well.
What level of algebra? Are you an undergrad or a professor?
I just completed my PhD in math which included some algebra
I am mostly familiar with algebra at the intro graduate level
Well there is some commutative algebra theorem which needs doing, being discussed here :-)
@Daniel Morrison Do you like homotopy? You might like to meet with Jiazhen and I to see what we're doing.
Take a look here where CW-complexes were recently formalized. I'll go ahead and message you some more info.
